ygData.subject: Re: Question about skill advancement.
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, the Sith was an ancient order of Dark Jedi founded after the first great division of the Jedi Order.  They were named so after enslaved a race known
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, the Sith was an ancient order of Dark Jedi founded after the first
great division of the Jedi Order. They were named so after enslaved a race
known as the Sith and becoming merciless warlords. Most of the Sith were
weeded out by the Old Republic in later years, but a grand temple still was
hidden on Yavin IV, presumably where Darth Sidious and Maul learned their
art. There is only one Dark Lord of the Sith at any time... Sidious is
beyond that title. The Dark Lords are the only ones to use red
lightsabres. Maul was the current Dark Lord, and Vader later became a Dark
Lord.

Anyway, that shows how much of a geek I am. Currently a 23rd level
Barbarian Warrior on Rallos Zek. I want this damn Executioner's Axe and
some Rubicite, though they tell me wait till late 20s. Bah waiting.

Odhinn MacDoughl
Skald, The Hand of Tyr


-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 24, 1999 11:08 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.


>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
>you are thinking of Sith, which is an elite assassin force of the empire,
Darth Vader, Lord of the Sith.
>
>Salr D'Taynkk
>Dark Warrior of The Kith
>Veeshan
>
>>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.23.99 8:46:33 PM >>>
>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>Wasn't the kith also the name of the Dark Force in starwars? I remember it
>being mentioned in Empire?? Its a nice sounding name.
>

>> >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.18.99 8:33:20 PM >>>
>> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>>
>> Dark warrior of the kith? What is the kith?
>>
>> > ----------
>> > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
>> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 3:00 AM
>> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.
>> >
>> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>> >
>> > Don't get your self killed for the sake of getting your skills maxed
out
>> > for that level. Your skills will advance it may take a couple levels
>> but
>> > they'll eventually get maxed out. If I were to go by your strategy of
>> > getting my self killed so my skills would be maxed out per level, I'd
>> > still be 25 working on my reposte skill, I'm almost 28th, so don't
>> expect
>> > everytime that you get a new skill that you will have it maxed out by
>> the
>> > time you make your next level.
>> >
>> > As far as factions are concerned.....one of the biggest advantages of
>> > being "evil" is that you can kill any good NPC you want to, and some of
>> > the good NPCs drop really nice loot. Personally I can't wait till I
get
>> > high 40s and I can walk into freeport and whoop up on some guards (with
>> a
>> > good evil party of course) :)
>> >
>> > Salr D'Taynkk
>> > Dark Warrior of The Kith
>> > Veeshan
>> >
>> > >>> "Tom Swift" <tswift@...> 5.18.99 12:10:55 PM >>>
>> >
>> > I am Bael, a warrior of the 15th Order and a dark elf. At the start of
>> > this level I put 20 points each into dual wield and double attack. I am
>> a
>> > little over a bubble away from 16 and my skills are now 65 for dual
>> wield
>> > and 72 for double attack. My rate of advancement has slowed
>> considerably,
>> > I am wondering if I should expect to max these at 80 before I hit 16 or
>> if
>> > that is uncommon.
>> >
>> > If I can max them I will likely get myself killed right before i level
>> up
>> > in order to buy some more time at 15.
>> >
>> > By the way I am using a combine scimitar and tentacle whip against
>> magical
>> > opponents and dual mino axes against non-magical opponents. My max
>> damage
>> > per round is 79, that is double attacks on both weapons with max
>> > damage(17) and a max damage kick (11).
>> >
>> > And in reference to others questions about faction. It is easy enough
>> to
>> > gain enough faction for the Commonlands vendors to deal with you, just
>> > kill orcs by the dozens. I kill every orc I see, pawns, centurions and
>> so
>> > on. You can get Freeport residents to deal with you by completing the
>> orc
>> > slashed belt quest repeatedly. If you do that tho you faction with the
>> > Paladins in North Freeport will get worse. It is up to you whether
West
>> > and east freeport are more important to you then North Freeport
>> >
>> > Bael
>> > 15th Order
>> > Indigo Brotherhood
>> >
>> >
>>
